description: This is a test module for the assessments router in a FastAPI application. It contains unit tests that mock the assessments service and verify API responses for listing, creating, and retrieving assessments.

classes.name: _FakeAssessmentsService
classes.description: A mock service class used to simulate assessments service responses during tests.

methods.name: test_assessments_list_ok_with_pagination
methods.description: Tests the assessments list endpoint with pagination parameters.

methods.name: test_assessments_create_returns_201
methods.description: Tests the assessments creation endpoint to ensure it returns status code 201 and correct payload.

methods.name: test_assessments_get_not_found
methods.description: Tests the retrieval of a non-existent assessment to verify 404 response.
